names: Nürnberg Views: Charming, naturally well-lit 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Old Town neighborhood. Close to the red line, shops and nightlife on Well '92s Street, and walking distance to the Whole Foods
more: Fully equipped kitchen with cookware, plates and dishes, dishwasher, fridge, microwave, stove, oven, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster Modern appliances like washing machine, iron, vacuum cleaner, ventilator,CD/DVD player, hair dryer TV with German and multilingual programs Double bed (160×200 cm), convertible couch for two people, bed linen and towels Broadband internet (WLAN) Upon request: highchair and crib as well as cleaning service
